General.Name: New Huadu Supercenter Co Ltd
General.Description: New Hua Du Supercenter Co., Ltd. engages in the retail and internet marketing businesses in China. It operates 78 supermarket stores and 6 department stores. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Fuzhou, China. New Hua Du Supercenter Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xinhuadu Industrial Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: North Building, Xinhuadu Building, Fuzhou, China, 350003

2.Name: Mr. Jiansheng  Guo
